5597.verse: عَيْنًا|A spring -|85|105|573$يَشْرَبُ|will drink|84|123|17646$بِهَا|from it|63|102|1203$عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ|(the) slaves of Allah;|160|199|17647$يُفَجِّرُونَهَا|causing it to gush forth|176|196|17648$تَفْجِيرًا|abundantly.|98|98|10536$

5599.verse: وَيُطْعِمُونَ|And they feed|118|126|17652$ٱلطَّعَامَ|the food|84|100|5162$عَلَىٰ|in spite of|86|102|52$حُبِّهِۦ|love (for) it,|101|117|17653$مِسْكِينًا|(to the) needy,|123|139|16709$وَيَتِيمًا|and (the) orphan|133|141|17654$وَأَسِيرًا|and (the) captive,|142|142|17655$

5600.verse: إِنَّمَا|`Only|57|66|102$نُطْعِمُكُمْ|we feed you|102|120|17656$لِوَجْهِ|for (the) Countenance|169|187|17657$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah.|86|104|2$لَا|Not|43|61|30$نُرِيدُ|we desire|83|101|5360$مِنكُمْ|from you|78|87|643$جَزَآءً|any reward|94|202|4954$وَلَا|and not|71|288|25$شُكُورًا|thanks.|87|195|12829$

5602.verse: فَوَقَـٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ|But Allah will protect them|195|203|17660$شَرَّ|(from the) evil|115|130|7203$ذَٲلِكَ|(of) that|78|94|28$ٱلْيَوْمِ|Day|67|82|17661$وَلَقَّـٰهُمْ|and will cause them to meet|208|216|17662$نَضْرَةً|radiance|80|318|17663$وَسُرُورًا|and happiness.|119|357|17664$

5603.verse: وَجَزَٮٰهُم|And will reward them|158|168|17665$بِمَا|because|75|94|43$صَبَرُواْ|they were patient,|144|163|6772$جَنَّةً|(with) a Garden|124|143|17666$وَحَرِيرًا|and silk.|98|108|17667$

5605.verse: وَدَانِيَةً|And near|80|98|17670$عَلَيْهِمْ|above them|98|134|22$ظِلَـٰلُهَا|(are) its shades|125|162|17671$وَذُلِّلَتْ|and will hang low|133|170|17672$قُطُوفُهَا|its cluster of fruits|143|161|17259$تَذْلِيلاً|very low.|81|81|17673$

5606.verse: وَيُطَافُ|And will be circulated|161|170|17674$عَلَيْهِم|among them|101|118|22$بِـَٔـانِيَةٍ|vessels|70|87|17675$مِّن|of|50|67|53$فِضَّةٍ|silver|68|85|15496$وَأَكْوَابٍ|and cups|98|115|15553$كَانَتْ|that are|74|83|888$قَوَارِيرَا۟|(of) crystal.|100|100|17676$

5608.verse: وَيُسْقَوْنَ|And they will be given to drink|221|227|17678$فِيهَا|therein|66|79|253$كَأْسًا|a cup -|69|82|16204$كَانَ|is|57|70|913$مِزَاجُهَا|its mixture|93|106|17644$زَنجَبِيلاً|(of) Zanjabil,|106|112|17679$

5610.verse: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ|And will circulate|144|154|16207$عَلَيْهِمْ|among them|101|121|22$وِلْدَٲنٌ|young boys|96|116|16524$مُّخَلَّدُونَ|made eternal.|111|131|16525$إِذَا|When|57|77|1370$رَأَيْتَهُمْ|you see them,|115|125|11589$حَسِبْتَهُمْ|you would think them|162|245|17682$لُؤْلُؤًا|(as) pearls|91|258|17683$مَّنثُورًا|scattered.|89|172|12741$

5612.verse: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ|Upon them|91|112|17686$ثِيَابُ|(will be) garments|139|180|17687$سُندُسٍ|(of) fine silk|99|140|10745$خُضْرٌ|green|80|121|17688$وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ‌ۖ|and heavy brocade.|152|172|17689$وَحُلُّوٓاْ|And they will be adorned|184|234|17690$أَسَاوِرَ|(with) bracelets|126|225|10740$مِن|of|50|149|53$فِضَّةٍ|silver,|68|118|15496$وَسَقَـٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ|and their Lord will give them to drink,|267|328|17691$شَرَابًا|a drink|75|197|17692$طَهُورًا|pure.|89|150|12796$

5615.verse: فَٱصْبِرْ|So be patient|110|121|8535$لِحُكْمِ|for (the) Command|145|166|16237$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|133|1322$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|125|25$تُطِعْ|obey|61|82|5972$مِنْهُمْ|from them|87|98|730$ءَاثِمًا|any sinner|88|201|17694$أَوْ|or|41|267|154$كَفُورًا|disbeliever.|94|207|10325$

5597.verse: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

5598.verse: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

5599.verse: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

5600.verse: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.

5601.verse: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."

5602.verse: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

5603.verse: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].

5604.verse: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.

5605.verse: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.

5606.verse: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],

5607.verse: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.

5608.verse: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

5609.verse: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.

5610.verse: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.

5611.verse: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.

5612.verse: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

5613.verse: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."

5614.verse: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.

5615.verse: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].

5616.verse: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
